categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname
Category:Imperial Navy pilots of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: "Wampa" was the nickname of a TIE fighter pilot who served within the Galactic Empire. As a member of the Black Squadron, the pilot flew a TIE/ln space superiority starfighter under the callsign Black Eleven during the Battle of Yavin. At some point during the Galactic Civil War, the pilot participated in an attack on an MC-series star cruiser.
